tables.table_schema: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS customers (id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY, name TEXT, email TEXT, phone TEXT)
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(100), phone_number VARCHAR(15))
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(10,2))
CREATE TABLE campaign_results (result_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_id INT, customer_id INT, conversion_rate DECIMAL(5,2), sales_amount DECIMAL(10,2))
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_name VARCHAR, email VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, campaign_name VARCHAR, start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL);
CREATE TABLE leads (lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, campaign_id INT, lead_name VARCHAR, lead_email VARCHAR, status VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE interactions (interaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lead_id INT, interaction_date TIMESTAMP, interaction_type VARCHAR, outcome VARCHAR);
CREATE TABLE customers (customer_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), email VARCHAR(50), phone VARCHAR(15))
CREATE TABLE campaigns (campaign_id INT PRIMARY KEY, name VARCHAR(50), start_date DATE, end_date DATE, budget DECIMAL(10,2))
CREATE TABLE leads (lead_id INT PRIMARY KEY, customer_id INT, campaign_id INT, status VARCHAR(20), source VARCHAR(50))
CREATE TABLE emails (email_id INT PRIMARY KEY, lead_id INT, subject VARCHAR(100), body TEXT, sent_date DATETIME)
CREATE TABLE responses (response_id INT PRIMARY KEY, email_id INT, lead_id INT, response_type VARCHAR(20), response_date DATETIME)
